section: VI - Organisations representing local, regional and municipal authorities, other public or mixed entities, etc.
goals__remit: The North Norway European Office represents the regional interests of North Norway in Brussels. Its main goals are to raise awareness in Brussels and in Europe of the particularities and benefits of increased cooperation with North Norway, while at the same time provide accurate and insightful information and analysis of current and relevant EU topics that influence North Norway.
